Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The user wants me to update a DECLARE model to mitigate bias in a loan application process. First let me understand the context This is a loan application review process There are sensitive attributes ApplicantAge ApplicantGender ApplicantRace Decision activities Approve Reject RequestAdditionalInfo Potential bias Decisions might be influenced by sensitive attributes without proper checks The current model has existence StartApplication FinalDecision init StartApplication coexistence StartApplication FinalDecision response StartApplication RequestAdditionalInfo succession RequestAdditionalInfo FinalDecision

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: I need to add constraints to prevent bias Let me think about what activities I should introduce Sensitive attribute checks CheckApplicantRace CheckApplicantGender CheckApplicantAge Bias mitigation activities ManualReview BiasMitigationCheck Specific decision variants RejectMinority ApproveMinority Constraints to add 1 Coexistence If a decision for sensitive group occurs eg RejectMinority ensure ManualReview coexists 2 Response Succession Ensure decisions dont immediately follow sensitive attribute checks without BiasMitigationCheck 3 Non-succession Prevent direct succession from CheckApplicantRace to Reject

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me check DECLARE semantics nonchainsuccession A B A cannot be directly followed by B nonsuccession A B if A occurs B cannot occur afterwards noncoexistence A B A and B cannot both appear noncoexistence A B cannot co-exist coexistence A B A occurs iff B occurs responded_existence A B if A occurs B must occur response A B if A occurs B must occur after precedence A B if B occurs A must have occurred before succession A B response A B and precedence A B

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: To ensure sequence Check BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision use response CheckApplicantRace BiasMitigationCheck response BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision precedence BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision Or succession CheckApplicantRace BiasMitigationCheck BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision nonchainsuccession CheckApplicantRace FinalDecision Prevents immediate decision after sensitive check For coexistence if RejectMinority occurs ManualReview must occur but since conditional use responded_existence or coexistence RejectMinority ManualReview

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: coexistence FinalDecision ManualReview too strict only for sensitive Maybe use responded_existence CheckApplicantRace ManualReview if race checked manual review must appear Coexistence too strong for ManualReview without RejectMinority so use responded_existence Existence for BiasMitigationCheck ManualReview too strong not all traces need it only sensitive cases DECLARE static so avoid unary existence for them

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final plan Add to responded_existence CheckApplicantRace ManualReview etc coexistence RejectMinority ManualReview ApproveMinority ManualReview response CheckApplicantRace BiasMitigationCheck BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision succession RequestAdditionalInfo FinalDecision BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision precedence BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision nonchainsuccession CheckApplicantRace FinalDecision etc Verify dictionary structure Keys strings Values dicts Binary source target support confidence Multiple sources ok

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: Rationale 1 responded_existence CheckSensitive ManualReview Ensures sensitive attribute access requires manual review 2 coexistence RejectMinority ManualReview Ensures sensitive decisions pair with review 3 response CheckSensitive BiasMitigationCheck Sensitive check triggers mitigation 4 succession BiasMitigationCheck FinalDecision Mitigation precedes decision 5 nonchainsuccession CheckSensitive FinalDecision Prevents immediate bias after sensitive data
